sentences.sContent: The U.S. is contributing $4 billion in loans, credits, and grants.
sentences.sCn: 美国以信贷和赠与的方式捐助了40亿美元。

synos.tran: 贡献，出力；[图情]投稿；[经]捐献
贡献，出力；[图情]投稿；[经]捐献

remMethod.val: con(全部) + tribut(给予) + e → 无偿给予 → 捐赠， 捐助

words.tran: 捐助的；贡献的；有助于…的
出资的；贡献的；有助于；助长...的

trans.tranCn: 捐赠， 捐助； 起作用， 影响
trans.tranOther: to give money, help, ideas etc to something that a lot of other people are also involved in
